name: Erica Pilger vs The World
description:
Erica Pilger vs The World is a platformer game that I made with a lot of affection to my bestie birthday Erica Pilger (she has an art account on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/phaica_art/   that you would love check it out >:3 )

The game is a side scroller 2D in pixel art where an unlucky artist, Eri, had her sketchbook stolen by an interdimensional evil bunny, and now she has to cross the multiverse chasing the malevolent Moacir.

She crosses from green hills with balloons, caves with wiki worms, ancient ruins in the sky, paranormal woods with floating orcs, cemetery with lost souls (and engineering students) to a galaxy in war, while she meet her friends and get to know funny personalities.

The Game has 32 eevee  Josefina Coins and 386 berries to collect

Hope you have lots of fun :)

Disclaimer: Even tho i draw some of the sprites on this game, most of them, different from my other games, were from public available sprite packs.

Music:

World 01: Original work

World 02: Gravity Falls theme in 8-bits

Wolrd 03: Celeste Theme

World 04: Star Wars theme
